item.description:

Hydro One Ltd. has signed a friendly deal to acquire U.S. energy company Avista Corp. for C$6.7 billion in an all-cash deal that would create one of the largest regulated utilities in North America. The Toronto-based company said Wednesday after the close of markets that it will pay C$67 per share in cash for the U.S. firm. item.title: Canadian utility Hydro One to buy Avista in $5.3bn deal - Financial Times
item.description:
Canadian utility Hydro One to buy Avista in $5.3bn deal  Financial Times

Canadian utility HydroOne said on Wednesday that it has agreed to buy US energy company Avista for $5.3bn in an all-cash transaction.
